documentation_crew.name: Documentation Crew
documentation_crew.description: Creates comprehensive documentation from codebase analysis

agents.name: code_explorer
agents.goal: Explore and map the CloudCurio codebase structure systematically
agents.backstory: You are a systematic code explorer whose primary role is to navigate through the CloudCurio monorepo and create a comprehensive map of all components, their relationships, and dependencies.

agents.name: tech_writer
agents.goal: Create clear, comprehensive documentation based on code analysis
agents.backstory: You are an expert technical writer specializing in creating documentation for complex software systems. You transform technical information into clear, accessible documentation.

agents.name: content_reviewer
agents.goal: Ensure documentation quality, accuracy, and completeness
agents.backstory: You are a content quality specialist with experience in reviewing technical documentation to ensure it meets standards for accuracy, completeness, and clarity.

tasks.name: code_mapping_task
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive map of the CloudCurio codebase, identifying all major components, their functions, and relationships.
tasks.expected_output: A detailed map of the CloudCurio codebase with component descriptions and relationships.

tasks.name: documentation_creation_task
tasks.description: Using the codebase map, create comprehensive documentation for the CloudCurio platform covering architecture, components, API, deployment, and development procedures.
tasks.expected_output: Complete documentation files in Markdown format covering all aspects of the CloudCurio platform.

tasks.name: quality_assurance_task
tasks.description: Review the created documentation for accuracy, completeness, clarity, and adherence to technical writing best practices.
tasks.expected_output: Quality review report with feedback on documentation accuracy, completeness, and areas for improvement.
